Cras ex enim, sollicitudin id feugiat at

03.07.2019 10:30  |  John Doe

Fusce a eros est. Pellentesque vel aliquet justo. Aliquam in tristique neque, in auctor felis. Donec tristique ante nec nisl vestibulum lacinia. Cras nec vehicula quam. Nam quis nisi id urna lobortis pulvinar. Vestibulum ante ipsum primis in faucibus orci luctus et ultrices posuere cubilia Curae; Nulla pulvinar eleifend lobortis. Etiam efficitur rhoncus augue at feugiat

Shovel Squad specializes in residential snow removal on privately owned properties. We service driveways, stairs, sidewalks and walkways. We’re a large network of local men and woman on call 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to assist with your winter needs. Anywhere you need snow cleared and de-icing, we can help!

Proud to be Serving:
  • Port Coquitlam
  • Coquitlam
  • Port Moody
  • North Shore
